blogPost.excerpt: Grow your audience on Social Media by delivering rich, high-quality content. Consistently, on schedule, at scale.
blogPost.body: Grow your audience on Social Media by delivering rich, high-quality content. Consistently, on schedule, at scale.
blogPost.title: FeedHive - A tool for Content Creators
blogPost.author: Simon Hoiberg

localize.description: 通过提供丰富、高质量的内容来增加您在社交媒体上的受众。始终如一、按计划、大规模地提供内容。
通過提供豐富、高質量的內容來增加您在社交媒體上的受衆。始終如一、按計劃、大規模地提供內容。

previous.excerpt: Color Spark is a Figma plugin that allows designers to apply a colour scheme to their design prototypes in seconds. Focus on your design, make it stunning, and stop wasting time.
previous.title: Color Spark - A color scheme plugin for Figma

localize.description: Color Spark是一款Figma插件，它允许设计师在几秒钟内将色彩方案应用到他们的设计原型中。专注于你的设计，让它惊艳，不再浪费时间。
Color Spark是一款Figma插件，它允許設計師在幾秒鐘內將色彩方案應用到他們的設計原型中。專注於你的設計，讓它驚豔，不再浪費時間。

next.excerpt: AwardsAdda is a centralized award repository, that caters to the needs to store and share your Awards & Achievements.
next.title: AwardsAdda -  AwardsAdda is a centralized award repository

localize.description: AwardsAdda是一个集中式的奖项库，它满足了存储和分享你的奖项和成就的需求。
AwardsAdda是一個集中式的獎項庫，它滿足了存儲和分享你的獎項和成就的需求。
